globals.authorProfile: Web developer with passion for learning. Developed an eCommerce Website prototype, Product Management Web Application prototype, and Bootstrap 4 template. Launched a non-profit Website, and currently building eCommerce Website for a local small business. Motivated to constantly evolve my knowledge while contributing to a company specializing in Web Development.

jobDescription: Building websites for local businesses and non profit organization while expanding my skill sets.
Work with church leaders, business owners to plan site/project design and contents.
Currently building eCommerce website and Product Management Web Application for Minnesota Recreation. See Projects section for info.
Launched a non-profit website of a local church.

experienceList.jobTitle: Volunteer Web Developer and Media Coordinator
jobDescription: Create web contents and maintain website to engage local community.
Increased Church Facebook Page traffic and activity.

projectList.projectLongTitle: Minnesota Recreation eCommerce Website and Product Management Application
projectList.projectDescription: Currently building Minnesota Recreation website to advertise and sell their products and sevices online.
projectList.projectImgAltText: A picture of Minnesota Recreation eCommerce Website
projectDetails: Project composes of static pages and the two seed prototype projects found below.
Continuously being develop along with the two prototypes made to show the idea behind the whole project and gather feedback from end users.
Most website's pages are static for SEO purposes and composes of single page eCommerce application for fast product browsing and checkout and single page admin panel for product CRUD operations.
See below prototype seed projects for more technical details.

projectList.projectDescription: A single page application prototype of an eCommerse Website.
projectList.projectImgAltText: A picture of a prototype of eCommerce single page Website
projectDetails: Front End is built with React, React-Router, Redux state management, and a Bootstrap 3 HTML template from Themeforest.
RESTful API is built with Node/Express and MongoDB/Mongoose.
Axios library is used to help with fetching resources and Web LocalStorage API is used to build the guest car functionality.
Learned at lot about the react ecosystem and how web technologies are used together for fetching resources, client and server routing, and client state management.

projectList.projectDescription: A prototype of a product managment web application with a main feature of creating and modifying a list of products.
projectList.projectImgAltText: A picture of a prototype of Admin Panel single page application
projectDetails: Front End is built using React, React-Router, Redux State Management, and Material UI React Component library.
RESTful API is built with Node/Express and MongoDB/Mongoose.
Used Material UI React Component library for the sake of learning the popular libary, and the concept behind CSS-in-JS.
Applied Agile project management methology learned from Atlassian, creator of Jira, and using a Jira alternative, Pivotal Tracker, to manage the project.

projectList.projectDescription: Multi page website of the NLCF Church built to engage members and local community by sharing their ministries and media.
projectList.projectImgAltText: A picture of NLCF Church website project
projectDetails: My very first development project to apply knowledge after learning the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JS, reusable CSS, responsive web design, User Experience, and SEO.
Used Bourbon Framework's Grid System, jQuery for most of the UI, and Harp JS to automate the building process.
Learned the importance of understanding who is the target audience in making effective websites or applications.

projectList.projectDescription: Bootstrap 4 HTML template for a business or portfolio websites.
projectList.projectImgAltText: A picture of Bootstrap 4 HTML templates for a business and portfolio websites.
projectDetails: Built project to gain proficiency on Bootstrap 4 framework and how to design an effective homepage or landing page of a website.
The template is responsive and can be use as a template for a business or portfolio website.
